title: Bare land for sale at Colombo 05
details:
The perfect plot of land for your residence in a highly residential neighborhood. quiet and clam surrounding with ample convenience at your doorstep.

This land consist of 8 perches bare land ready for you to construct. Suitable location, also being an ideal investment for a brighter future.

Easy access to both Baseline road and Kirulapana. Schools, Banks, Hospitals, Restaurants and other basic amenities within close range.

Enjoy life to the fullest in your dream home.

Call Linea Property for more inquiries.
